name: Finger Soccer 2015
description:
Finger Soccer is a flexible football game that can be played as a single player (player vs CPU) or 2-Players (two players on a same device).

Players can select and drag on their units to adjust the power and direction of the shoot.

There is also plenty of defensive and offensive formation available to play the game with tactics and strategy.

Features:
- This is a turn-based game
- Simple, but highly addictive physics based gameplay
- Realistic physics for a thrilling game-play

Controls:
Mouse Button 1 hold and drag = direction to move selected player

Have fun!
